Eye of Innocence

miscellaneous (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 350
stealth bonus [stealthb]: +40
(unremovable [cursed], won't-be-picked-up [nofind], magiceye [magiceye])

Requires 10S to forge (S2)

This magic gemstone is activated by replacing one of the user's eyes with it. Those who look into the magic eye will perceive that person as innocent of whatever he may be suspected of. A man with such an innocent look cannot possibly have done anything bad. This eye helps tremendously when skulking about in enemy territory and trying not to get caught.
